QuestData.Title: The Roughnecks
QuestData.Description:
NEW JOB OPPORTUNITIES!
Do you seek danger? Beasts in great quantities? Perilous adventure? Do you also prefer the rugged outdoors to the dainty frilly froo-froo estate life?
Well, you might be cutout to be a ROUGHNECK, suppliers of all gryphon mounts in Kul Tiras.
Inquire at the Roughneck Camp in Westwind Weald about this exciting new opportunity.
Applicants must NOT be afraid of heights, feathers, and/or death.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Tagart at the Roughneck Camp.
QuestData.RewardText: Here for the job are ye? Well buckle up house cat, it gets rough from here on out.
